meaning: ▶ cerebral apoplexy 뇌일혈 ▶ heat apoplexy 열사병(熱射病) ▶ be seized with apoplexyhave (a fit of) apoplexyhave a stroke of apoplexy 졸중으로 쓰러지다
details:
ap·o·plex·y n. [U] 【병리】 졸중
▶ cerebral apoplexy 뇌일혈
▶ heat apoplexy 열사병(熱射病)
▶ be seized with apoplexy=have (a fit of) apoplexy=have a stroke of apoplexy 졸중으로 쓰러지다
